Package com.conversor.model

Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
com.conversor.model.MainMenu
public class MainMenu extends Object
MainMenu is the class in charge to display the JOptionPane dialog to start the selection for every type of the conversor (Monedas, Temperatura y Distancias).

This class has 3 attributes, 2 statics an 1 object:

The 1st static is an array that stores the 3 options mentioned previously.

The 2nd static is the ImageIcon who stores the corresponding icon.

The Object will store the output of the dialog.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jorge Villafuerte

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MainMenu()
    The constructor stores the output of the dialog inside the variable optionSelected.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    openOptionSelected()
    This method is called when an option is selected from the dialog.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MainMenu

      public MainMenu()
      The constructor stores the output of the dialog inside the variable optionSelected. This dialog has a message, a tittle, an icon, 3 options (the 1st option is selected by default) and 2 action buttons (OK, Cancel).

  • Method Details

    • openOptionSelected

      public void openOptionSelected()
      This method is called when an option is selected from the dialog. When is called checks the option selected and creates an anonymous ConversorMonedas, ConversorTemperaturas or ConversorDistancias, these three are extended from ConversorBase.
